TopicTitle: Undocking at end of KAL-1000 sequence

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to add an undock command at the end of a track on a KAL-1000. I add the command to the track window and place a point on the dotted line that shows near the end of the sequence. Yet when I play it the undock does not happen. I can see that the sequence is playing, and even see that I can place other items in the track like toggling lights and such and they work fine, but not the undocking command. I know it doesn't happen because the ports are still docked and it doesn't actually undock until I right click the docking port and chose undock, at which point it undocks fine as you'd expect. I just can't get it to undock in the track sequence.

Anybody else having a similar issue getting certain commands to work in a track sequence of a KAL-1000 part?

Edited August 3, 2019 by OldLost
